product_name: Obermeyer Kismet Insulated Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The toddlers' Obermeyer Kismet jacket nestles your wee one in cute, full-featured comfort for continuous play on the slopes and fun on the flats. I-Grow(TM) system lets you lengthen sleeves up to 1.5 in. as child grows. Tough, partially recycled polyester shell with HydroBlock(R) waterproof, breathable coating gives solid protection from the wind and snow. Permaloft(R) polyester insulation provides lightweight, non-bulky warmth for all-day comfort. Smooth nylon taffeta lining slides easily over clothing for easy layering without binding. Removable insulated hood adjusts to fit securely and keep heat loss to a minimum; fleece chin guard and collar lining prevent chafing of tender skin. The Obermeyer Kismet jacket features zippered, tricot-lined handwarmer pockets and an interior goodies pocket for plenty of storage options.
short_description: The toddlers' Obermeyer Kismet jacket nestles your wee one in cute, full-featured comfort for continuous play on the slopes and fun on the flats.
